articles.author: Agence France-Presse
articles.title: England Pace Great Stuart Broad To Retire After Fifth Ashes Test - NDTV Sports
articles.description: England great Stuart Broad said Saturday he would retire from all cricket following the conclusion of the ongoing fifth Ashes Test against Australia at The Oval
articles.content: England great Stuart Broad said Saturday he will retire from all cricket following the conclusion of the ongoing fifth Ashes Test against Australia at The Oval, describing his career as "a wonderful … [+1332 chars]
